nodes.text: Battle of the Makem system  (Mandalorian Wars)

A battle was fought between the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders and the Galactic Republic in the Makem system sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars. The Mandalorians reached Makem after a battle in the Lianna system, where they were victorious. They defeated their opponents at Makem and then moved on to fight a battle in the Quermia system.

The battle is only referenced once in The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the course of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose. In the Atlas, the Makem system is denoted as the "Makem Te system" after the planet of Makem Te, which it contains.
